title: Ant Group’s Topnod Launches 1–4 USD Blockchain Art; 4,088 Pieces Gone in 3 Hours
body: Key Takeaways: Ant Group’s move with Topnod indicates blockchain’s expansion into cultural and creative industries in China. The initiative could test demand for low‑priced blockchain‑verified collectibles in mainstream consumer markets. Integration with Alibaba’s broader ecosystem may accelerate adoption across commerce and digital services. Ant Group’s digital asset platform Topnod has launched its “Online Digital Art Exhibition,” according to a Sina Technology News report published on August 4. Unlike the B2C model adopted by other digital art marketplaces, the platform allows creators to upload and sell their artworks once they have passed copyright review and declaration. Each purchase is recorded with a unique blockchain identification number, providing permanent ownership to the buyer. Pre‑Sale and Public Sale Model Topnod said the exhibition adopts a “pre‑sale + public sale” structure. During pre‑sale, user interest helps determine whether the artwork will be issued, the quantity minted, and its pricing. Public sales then proceed with finalized editions. The pricing model, typically ranging between 8 and 28 yuan (about 1–4 USD), is designed as a small “tip‑like” mechanism for users to support their preferred artists. Within three hours of launch, 4,088 pieces were reserved by users, according to the report. Artists, including painter Dai Dunbang and recent graduates of art academies, are among the first group of participants. The platform said it intends to help creators gain visibility while receiving market feedback to support ongoing work. Support for Digital Art Creators A Topnod program manager said the platform will allocate internal and external traffic resources to promote the exhibition and retail creator shops. It will also provide support to help artists attract and manage fans. Topnod also plans to develop a digital artist ecosystem to foster collaboration among creators and integrate online and offline engagement. Ant Group is an affiliate of Alibaba Group , best known for operating Alipay, and has been expanding its presence in blockchain through initiatives focused on digital finance and asset verification. Ant Group was excited to participate in WAIC 2025 in Shanghai, where we showcased our comprehensive advancements in AI technologies and products, including the AI healthcare manager AQ and a series of AI large models. As Cyril Han, CEO of Ant Group, noted, “Ant Group is… pic.twitter.com/kMl6wqVrkf — Ant Group (@AntGroup) July 30, 2025 The company has developed multiple blockchain applications in supply chain management, cross‑border trade, and intellectual property protection. Topnod shows Ant Group’s ongoing strategy to integrate blockchain into consumer‑facing platforms, extending beyond payments into digital identity, data services, and now cultural content. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What role could blockchain play in intellectual property enforcement through Topnod? Unique blockchain IDs provide verifiable ownership records, potentially reducing counterfeit risks and strengthening copyright protection for digital artists. Could Topnod’s model influence global digital art markets? If successful, the model could encourage other markets to adopt blockchain‑verified collectibles with micro‑pricing to expand participation. What challenges might the platform face? Adoption could depend on demand, user trust, regulatory approval, and whether low‑cost digital art translates into sustainable income for creators. The post Ant Group’s Topnod Launches 1–4 USD Blockchain Art; 4,088 Pieces Gone in 3 Hours appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: CrediX DeFi Protocol Exploited as Hacker Gains Admin Rights, Drains Pool
body: DeFi lending protocol CrediX suffered a $4.5 million exploit after attackers gained administrative control of the project’s multisig wallet and abused bridge privileges to mint unbacked collateral tokens. The breach occurred six days before detection when the compromised admin account was granted multiple high-level roles, including pool admin, bridge controller, and emergency admin permissions. Source: SlowMist on X Blockchain security firms SlowMist and PeckShield identified that the attacker used Tornado Cash-funded addresses to bridge funds to the Sonic network before exploiting the BRIDGE role to mint acUSDC tokens directly. The hacker then borrowed large amounts against the worthless collateral, draining approximately $2.64 million from the protocol’s lending pools. Attack Mirrors Previous Exchange Exploits Using Admin Compromise The CrediX exploit follows a pattern established by major crypto hacks, including the $234 million WazirX breach in July 2024 . Both attacks involved compromised administrative access that bypassed normal security measures through legitimate-appearing transactions from authorized accounts. Security analysis revealed that the attacker’s address 0xF321***662e held extensive privileges across CrediX’s infrastructure. The POOL_ADMIN, BRIDGE, ASSET_LISTING_ADMIN, EMERGENCY_ADMIN, and RISK_ADMIN roles provided comprehensive control over protocol operations and asset management. Today's @CrediX_fi hack is due to compromised admin account 0xF321683831Be16eeD74dfA58b02a37483cEC662e, which has a number of roles, including POOL_ADMIN, BRIDGE, ASSET_LISTING_ADMIN, EMERGENCY_ADMIN, and RISK_ADMIN. And the BRIDGE role is abused to drain/borrow pool assets… https://t.co/JGuLmh8zWu pic.twitter.com/0jmAuvtcJv — PeckShield Inc. (@peckshield) August 4, 2025 The bridge role abuse allowed direct minting of collateral tokens without backing assets, creating artificial value that supported massive borrowing positions. After draining the pools, most stolen funds were bridged back to the Ethereum mainnet with no subsequent movement detected by monitoring systems. CrediX immediately disabled its website to prevent additional user deposits while directing existing users to withdraw funds directly through smart contracts. The protocol had previously secured a $60 million credit line in 2023, making it a major player in institutional DeFi lending markets. The attack methodology resembles the WazirX hack, where malicious actors manipulated multisig wallet interfaces to trick authorized signers into approving compromised smart contract upgrades. Both incidents leveraged open vulnerabilities in known administrative access controls and multisig security implementations. Crypto Security Deteriorates Amid Rising Exploit Frequency The CrediX breach adds to crypto’s devastating 2025 security record, with July losses reaching $142 million across 17 major incidents , according to PeckShield data. July crypto hack losses surge 27% to $142 million with CoinDCX's $44 million insider breach and GMX's $42 million exploit leading victims. #July #CryptoHack https://t.co/4UCMKaxUvI — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) August 1, 2025 The 27.2% increase from June’s $111.6 million reversed a temporary decline in hack-related losses. Major July exploits included Indian exchange CoinDCX losing $44.2 million through insider involvement and GMX protocol suffering $42 million in re-entrancy attacks. The CoinDCX incident involved employee Rahul Agarwal, whose compromised laptop provided hackers with system access after receiving malicious files from German contacts. Physical violence against crypto holders escalated alongside digital attacks, with 32 “wrench attacks” reported globally in 2025. For example, France experienced nearly one-third of incidents , including kidnapping attempts targeting crypto executives and their family members, with ransom demands reaching €7 million. Crypto investors also lost over $2.2 billion in 2025’s first half through 344 separate incidents, already exceeding all of 2024’s security losses. Wallet-related breaches accounted for $1.7 billion across 34 attacks, while phishing scams stole $410 million in 132 incidents. The WazirX exchange remains in legal proceedings following its 2024 hack, with Singapore’s High Court recently allowing creditor revoting on an amended restructuring plan . The court reversal provides hope for affected users who have been unable to access funds for nearly one year. Recovery efforts across all 2025 incidents have returned $187 million through law enforcement action, white-hat agreements, and exchange cooperation. However, net losses still total approximately $2.29 billion with an average incident loss of $7.1 million. For CrediX, the protocol has announced a full refund for all affected users within 24-48 hours, with a post-mortem report expected to be released after restoration. All users funds will be recovered in full within 24-48 hours — CrediX (@CrediX_fi) August 4, 2025 The post CrediX DeFi Protocol Exploited as Hacker Gains Admin Rights, Drains Pool appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Quant Analyst PlanB Predicts Contrarian $300,000 Bitcoin Price Target – Here’s His Timeline
body: Widely followed quant analyst PlanB is taking an opposing view to most traders about the chances of Bitcoin ( BTC ) reaching $300,000. In a new strategy session, pseudonymous BTC analyst PlanB tells his 216,000 YouTube subscribers that while most market participants don’t expect BTC to reach $300,000 by the end of 2026, he does. “Now, 60% of people think that Bitcoin will not reach $300,000 by the end of 2026 – that’s this line, one and a half years from now. So, by the end of next year, this is the $300,000 point. Sixty percent of people think we’re not going to get there. In my opinion, we will. In fact, I think we’ll go a little higher, to the stock-to-flow target of $500,000 on average. That’s a very rough model, of course, based on scarcity and the stock-to-flow ratio. It has a range of $250,000 to $1 million, so the average could be $300,000 or $600,000. That’s all good, but at the very least, it will be higher than what most people think.” The stock-to-flow model is a predictive tool that assumes the scarcity of a commodity drives the price. While originally created to track traditional commodities, PlanB was the first to apply it to Bitcoin. The analyst is also watching Bitcoin’s realized price indicator, which looks at what price certain cohorts of coins were last transacted on-chain, divided by the number of bitcoins in circulation. Given that the price of BTC is above all the major cohorts, PlanB says there are no signs of a bear market to be seen. “Now, that’s classic bull market behavior, right? You can see that in all bull markets – the 2-year is above the realized, the 6-month is above the 2-year, and then Bitcoin, represented by the red dots, is above them all. So there’s no bear market warning signs whatsoever.” BTC is worth $115,043 at time of writing, up 1% on the day. title: 4 best cryptos to buy today and hold until 2026 to make $1,000,000 from $2,000
body: With a new bull run approaching, investing $2,000 on breakout coins such as LILPEPE, TON, SEI, and DOGE can grow your investment by 2026. These projects load meme energy while being technologically advanced and swiftly adopted, making them favourable for great gains during the next wave of cryptocurrency. Little Pepe (LILPEPE) Current price: $0.002 Potential by 2026: $1+ Little Pepe is a fast-rising meme coin that blends community-driven hype with real utility through its Layer-2 blockchain. Unlike traditional meme coins that rely solely on market sentiment, LILPEPE is building its zero-tax, bot-resistant Layer-2 chain optimized for launching and trading meme coins. Its presale is nearly sold out, signalling strong early interest, and the team plans multiple CEX listings post-launch. What makes Little Pepe especially compelling is its massive upside potential from its extremely low price point. An increase to just $0.01 would mean a 5,000%+ gain! That’s a lot, no doubt, but a climb to $1 would mean a 500,000x return, turning $2,000 into a whopping $1 billion! Such crazy profits are extremely hard to come by, but even a sliver of that target would yield profits in the millions. Why hold until 2026? Little Pepe is in its early phase and has yet to hit major exchanges. As its ecosystem matures and its Layer-2 solution gains adoption, it could mirror the meteoric rise of Shiba Inu and PEPE, with utility to back it up. Toncoin (TON) Current Price: ~$3.30 Potential by 2026: $15–$25 Toncoin, the native token of The Open Network, is making serious strides toward mainstream adoption, especially after integrating a Toncoin wallet directly into Telegram for 87 million US users. This move positions TON as one of the few Layer-1 blockchains with a real-world communication app driving daily usage. The newly established $400 million institutional treasury is even more significant, created without a traditional fundraising round. Supported by Kingsway Capital and top US venture firms, this war chest is earmarked for ecosystem development, liquidity support, and new partnerships, signalling long-term confidence in TON’s success. Technically, Toncoin has reclaimed its key $3.00 level and is poised for a 20–21% short-term breakout to $3.70 or higher. In the long term, the combination of Telegram-based retail adoption and institutional backing makes Toncoin a strong contender for a $15–$25 valuation by 2026. Why hold until 2026? TON has the infrastructure, partnerships, and user base to become a leading innovative contract platform — especially if Telegram becomes the “WeChat of crypto.” With a solid foundation and real-world utility, Toncoin is one of today’s most undervalued large-cap plays. SEI (SEI Network) Current Price: ~$0.35 Potential by 2026: $5–$7 SEI Network is a speedy Layer-1 blockchain for DeFi, trading, and gaming. SEI’s smart consensus model and lightning-fast transaction finality make it different. These features let SEI take on high-frequency trading workloads that older chains struggle to handle. The current technical setup is bullish across multiple timeframes. SEI recently broke out of a long-standing trendline resistance, retested support successfully, and maintains momentum above $0.345. With rising volume and RSI in the low 60s, there’s room for a parabolic move if key resistance levels are flipped. SEI is targeting $0.45 in the short term, but its long-term upside is far greater. With a rapidly maturing ecosystem and increased adoption in DeFi and GameFi sectors, SEI could realistically achieve a $5–$7 valuation within the next cycle. Why hold until 2026? SEI’s technical underpinnings and specific use-case focus make it one of the most scalable and utility-rich chains in development. As DeFi regains momentum, chains like SEI that optimize for speed and efficiency will be in high demand. Dogecoin (DOGE) Current Price: ~$0.25 Potential by 2026: $1.50–$3.00 Dogecoin is the first-ever meme coin and one of the strongest assets still trading in the crypto world. Even though some people still think of it as a simple prank coin, DOGE has grown a considerable fan base, has actual ways people use it daily (like tipping and sending payments), and even sees heavy trading from big institutions. As of late July 2025, Dogecoin is back in a key accumulation zone ($0.15–$0.22) that historically precedes explosive rallies. Analysts like Ali Martinez and TradingShot indicate that DOGE mirrors its 2021 breakout structure. A run to $0.50 by September is feasible, and a $1.50–$3.00 price by 2026 isn’t out of the question if historical trends repeat. Whale accumulation is surging, with over 1.08 billion DOGE scooped up in 48 hours. This, combined with a breakout above a descending trendline and bullish momentum on multiple timeframes, suggests that DOGE’s next parabolic phase may be approaching. Why hold until 2026? DOGE has proven staying power, wide retail recognition, and institutional support. Should another meme-fueled rally take place, particularly with new altcoin adoption cycles, there’s no doubt that Dogecoin could surpass its previous all-time high (ATH). Bottom line: turning $2,000 into $1,000,000 Let’s break down a sample investment strategy to aim for that elusive $1 million target: $500 in Little Pepe @ $0.0018 → Potential 555,000 LILPEPE → If LILPEPE hits $1 = $555,000 $500 in Toncoin @ $3.30 → ~151 TON → If TON hits $25 = $3,775 $500 in SEI @ $0.35 → ~1,428 SEI → If SEI hits $7 = $10,000 $500 in Dogecoin @ $0.25 → 2,000 DOGE → If DOGE hits $3 = $6,000 Even conservative estimates suggest huge upside, but if even one of these coins makes a 100x+ move — especially Little Pepe — it could carry the portfolio to millionaire status. title: Metaplanet Doubles Down on Bitcoin as Shares Slide, Buys Another $54M
body: Metaplanet (3350) , a Tokyo-listed investment firm, said it bought another 463 bitcoin (BTC), emphasizing the cryptocurrency's long-term shareholder value even as its stock fell more than 7% to sit at half the value it held in June. The latest purchase cost the company 7.995 billion yen ($540 million) at an average price of 17.3 million yen per bitcoin and takes total holdings to 17,595 BTC. In all, Metaplanet has paid some 261.28 billion yen for its stash. The purchase comes amid a slump in Metaplanet’s share price, which slid to 987 yen on Monday, almost 50% below its June peak. With its value reflecting both the changing price of bitcoin and the increase in its BTC holdings, Metaplanet is positioning itself as Asia’s closest proxy to a bitcoin exchange-traded fund. The company reported BTC Yield, which gauges bitcoin accumulation per share, of 309.8% for fourth-quarter 2024 and 129.4% for the second quarter. The yield has slowed to 52.6% as of Aug. 4.

title: Meme coin rout drives traders to DeFi as Pepe gains 8.2% with huge volume
body: Decentralized finance is again gaining momentum, and Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has quickly become one of the most watched presale tokens in this sector. Pepe secures smart 8.2% gains Pepe (PEPE) surged 8.2% in 24 hours, reaching ~$0.00001132, capitalizing on meme coin momentum, per CoinGecko data. The rally, driven by a 28.5% trading volume spike to $961 million, follows Binance.US’s listing and removal of the “Seed Tag,” signaling reduced risk perception. On-chain data shows a whale withdrawing 2 trillion PEPE, boosting confidence, though a 13.91% weekly dip reflects volatility. Technical indicators, with an RSI at 60 and a cup-and-handle pattern, suggest a potential 25% climb to $0.000014, with resistance at $0.00001214. Despite lacking utility, PEPE’s 1,764% yearly gain and $4.75 billion market cap highlight strong community support. However, 48% of holders being short-term adds sell-off risk. Posts on X note PEPE’s breakout potential, but competition from newer meme coins like Little Pepe could cap gains. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Unlike meme-driven plays, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is being built to operate with two core income layers built into its ecosystem: stablecoin lending through its P2C (Peer-to-Contract) pools and interest-accruing mtTokens. These features allow users to actually earn yield in real time, not just speculate on price. Here’s how it works: when users deposit assets such as AVAX into a P2C pool, they retain full exposure to their original token while generating APY that automatically compounds. For example, a $2,000 AVAX deposit into Mutuum Finance (MUTM)’s lending pools will earn 9.8% APY without needing to sell the asset. The return is fueled by borrowers who lock collateral to access funds from the same shared pool. Since lending rates are algorithmically adjusted based on pool utilization, the system remains self-regulating and capital-efficient. MUTM buybacks and stablecoin expansion signal next-gen DeFi Lenders aren’t the only ones earning yield. Once users receive mtTokens (like mtAVAX or mtUSDT) after depositing into the platform, they can stake these tokens into designated smart contracts. Staking mtTokens adds a second revenue layer: MUTM token rewards. These rewards aren’t arbitrarily minted—instead, they are purchased back from the open market using the protocol’s revenue, offering long-term sustainability and market support. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has a third innovation lined up: a decentralized stablecoin that will enter circulation through overcollateralized loans. Minting will be pegged 1:1 to the USD and tied directly to asset-backed borrowing, while burning will occur on repayments. This system is designed to maintain a $1 peg without relying on centralized reserves. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Finance is currently in Phase 1 of its roadmap, with most of the foundational tasks already completed. As it prepares to enter Phase 2—’Building’—the focus will shift toward core smart contract development, DApp front-end and back-end construction, and implementation of advanced features. These steps will pave the way for Phase 3—’ Finalizing’—which includes beta testing, security audits, and preparation for launch. The final Phase 4—’ Delivering’—will see the full mainnet deployment, token listings, and expanded platform features, completing Mutuum Finance (MUTM)’s vision of a comprehensive and secure DeFi ecosystem. Currently in Phase 6 of its presale, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is priced at $0.035, with 10% of the 170 million token allocation already sold and over 14,800 holders onboard. The presale has now raised more than $13.9 million. With the next phase priced at $0.040, a 15% jump is imminent, creating urgency for investors aiming to lock in a lower entry point before listing. Mutuum Finance (MUTM)’s presale stages have already rewarded early participants handsomely. Investors from Phase 1, who swapped assets like Ethereum (ETH) or Solana (SOL) at just $0.01 per MUTM, are now sitting on 3x returns. With the listing price set at $0.06, Phase 6 buyers at $0.035 stand to gain over 70% upon launch, without factoring in any additional upside post-listing. $100K giveaway Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has also secured a high-level security profile through its partnership with CertiK. The protocol boasts a Token Scan score of 95 and a Skynet score of 78. In addition, a $50,000 bug bounty is currently live to further harden the codebase. Community traction is growing fast as well, with over 12,000 followers on Twitter and a $100,000 giveaway campaign currently active, where 10 lucky users will receive $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens. As retail euphoria in meme coins fades just as fast as it rises, projects like Mutuum Finance (MUTM) are building to offer a compelling long-term value proposition. Meme coins offer moments. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) offers mechanisms. From algorithmic lending pools to mtToken staking, and from stablecoin minting to revenue-backed buybacks, the foundation is being laid for a serious DeFi player. While the meme crowd chases the next 8.2% candle, forward-looking traders are securing future yield, ecosystem utility, and pre-listing upside with MUTM. title: Bitcoin Demand: Unwavering Strength Despite Market Turbulence
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Demand: Unwavering Strength Despite Market Turbulence Bitcoin demand continues to be a central topic in the ever-evolving cryptocurrency landscape. Even as the market experiences its inevitable dips and surges, a fascinating narrative emerges from the data: the underlying appetite for Bitcoin remains robust. This resilience challenges conventional wisdom that price volatility always dampens investor interest. Instead, we are witnessing a powerful testament to long-term conviction among Bitcoin holders. Recent insights from CryptoQuant contributor Darkfost on X shed light on this compelling trend. His analysis suggests that despite recent price volatility, the foundational Bitcoin demand is not just holding steady, but actively growing. Understanding the metrics behind this phenomenon is crucial for anyone seeking to grasp the true dynamics of the world’s leading cryptocurrency. Understanding Sustained Bitcoin Demand: What the Data Reveals When the market experiences turbulence, many expect a significant exodus of capital. However, for Bitcoin, the story appears different. Darkfost’s analysis points to substantial accumulation, indicating a persistent belief in Bitcoin’s value proposition. This isn’t just anecdotal; it’s backed by specific on-chain metrics that paint a clear picture of strong underlying Bitcoin demand . Significant Accumulation: Over the past 30 days, approximately 160,000 BTC have been accumulated. This figure compares new Bitcoin issuance with supply held in long-term inactive wallets, suggesting active absorption by buyers. Steady Buying Pressure: The addition of 160,000 BTC in a short period, even during price fluctuations, indicates consistent buying pressure. Dips are viewed as opportunities for acquisition. Market Absorption: This accumulation demonstrates the market’s capacity to absorb significant amounts of Bitcoin without drastic price depreciation, indicating healthy liquidity for persistent Bitcoin demand . This sustained accumulation highlights a market where participants are positioning themselves for long-term growth, reflecting a maturing asset class where conviction outweighs transient volatility. Who is Fueling This Unwavering Bitcoin Demand? It’s not just about the quantity of Bitcoin being accumulated; it’s also about the nature of the wallets doing the accumulating. Darkfost’s analysis provides a granular look at the types of holders contributing to this robust Bitcoin demand , offering insights into their investment philosophies. One particularly insightful metric highlights wallets that have consistently accumulated Bitcoin without making any sales. These “hodlers” are individuals or entities committed to holding their Bitcoin for extended periods, regardless of market conditions. Their behavior is a powerful indicator of deep conviction. Dedicated Accumulators: During the same 30-day period, nearly 50,000 BTC were added by wallets that have only ever accumulated Bitcoin, never selling. This cohort represents the most steadfast segment of the Bitcoin ecosystem. Reflecting Strong Conviction: The activity of these “accumulation-only” wallets underscores a profound belief in Bitcoin’s long-term value. Their continuous additions, even during price declines, signify a strategic approach focused on future appreciation. Foundation of Stability: These long-term holders form a crucial foundation for Bitcoin’s price stability. Their unwillingness to sell during downturns helps absorb selling pressure, providing a bedrock of Bitcoin demand . This trend suggests a significant portion of the market comprises sophisticated investors or individuals with high conviction in Bitcoin’s future. They are not easily swayed by short-term price swings, preferring to ride out volatility in anticipation of future gains. This investor behavior is critical for the long-term health and growth of any asset class. What Do OTC Desks Reveal About Long-Term Bitcoin Demand? Beyond on-chain wallet behavior, the activity of Over-The-Counter (OTC) desks offers another compelling piece of the puzzle regarding sustained Bitcoin demand . OTC desks facilitate large, private transactions between institutional buyers and sellers, often bypassing public exchanges. The amount of Bitcoin held by these desks indicates institutional and high-net-worth individual interest. A significant observation from Darkfost’s analysis is the sharp decline in the amount of Bitcoin held by OTC desks. This trend is highly indicative of strong long-term absorption by large players. Metric September 2021 Current Holdings Implication for Bitcoin Demand BTC held by OTC Desks ~550,000 BTC ~145,000 BTC Significant decline suggests strong absorption by institutional buyers. The dramatic reduction from approximately 550,000 BTC in September 2021 to around 145,000 BTC today is a powerful signal. This isn’t just Bitcoin moving from one wallet to another; it’s Bitcoin moving from a liquidity provider (OTC desk) into the hands of long-term holders, often institutions or high-net-worth individuals who intend to hold these assets for an extended period. Reduced Supply for Large Buyers: A lower balance on OTC desks means less available Bitcoin for large, private purchases. This scarcity can contribute to upward price pressure as institutional Bitcoin demand continues. Institutional Absorption: The decline suggests large entities are actively buying Bitcoin and moving it off these desks, presumably into cold storage. This reflects a strategic, rather than speculative, investment approach. Indicator of Maturing Market: The shift away from readily available OTC supply towards long-term holdings signifies a maturing market where significant capital is deployed with a long-term horizon, lending credibility to Bitcoin as a serious investment. The convergence of these data points – consistent accumulation by general holders, unwavering commitment from accumulation-only wallets, and the significant draw-down from OTC desks – paints a cohesive picture of remarkably strong and resilient Bitcoin demand , even amidst prevailing market uncertainties. Navigating Market Volatility: Bitcoin’s Underlying Strength While daily price movements often dominate headlines, a deeper dive into on-chain analytics reveals a more profound narrative about Bitcoin’s intrinsic strength. The consistent Bitcoin demand , as evidenced by the metrics discussed, suggests that volatility is increasingly viewed as a temporary state rather than a fundamental flaw. Understanding these underlying dynamics is essential for investors looking beyond short-term fluctuations: Benefits of Long-Term Perspective: Focusing on accumulation trends and long-term holding patterns provides a more stable outlook than reacting to every price swing. It highlights that a significant portion of the market is playing a long game. Challenges of Short-Term Noise: The primary challenge for investors is often filtering out the short-term noise and emotional reactions. The data from CryptoQuant reminds us that the fundamentals of Bitcoin demand remain robust, even when headlines suggest otherwise. Actionable Insights for Investors: These insights suggest that dips may represent opportunities for accumulation rather than reasons for divestment. It encourages a disciplined approach focused on long-term growth, aligning with the behavior of seasoned holders. The consistent absorption of newly issued Bitcoin and the depletion of OTC reserves underscore a growing scarcity effect, further reinforcing the long-term bullish case. As more Bitcoin moves into long-term holdings, the available supply on exchanges for immediate sale decreases, potentially leading to increased price pressure when Bitcoin demand surges. This dynamic creates a virtuous cycle: strong conviction leads to accumulation, which reduces available supply, potentially driving prices higher, which in turn can reinforce conviction. Bitcoin’s unique on-chain transparency allows us to observe these underlying forces of demand and supply in a way that is often impossible for traditional assets. In conclusion, the narrative around Bitcoin’s market performance is often simplified to price charts, but a deeper dive into on-chain data reveals a far more nuanced and encouraging story. The unwavering Bitcoin demand , evidenced by significant accumulation from steadfast holders and the notable depletion of OTC desk reserves, paints a picture of robust underlying strength. Despite the market’s inherent volatility, the consistent absorption of Bitcoin into long-term holdings underscores a powerful conviction among investors. This isn’t just about weathering storms; it’s about actively building positions, reflecting a profound belief in Bitcoin’s enduring value proposition and its role in the future of finance. The data suggests that for a growing segment of the market, Bitcoin is not merely a speculative asset but a strategic, long-term investment, reinforcing its position as a resilient digital store of value. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) About Bitcoin Demand 1. What does “Bitcoin demand” mean in the context of market drops? Even during market downturns, “Bitcoin demand” refers to the continued interest and willingness of investors to buy and hold Bitcoin. This is measured by metrics like accumulation rates, the behavior of long-term holders, and the supply held by institutional desks. 2. How is strong Bitcoin demand identified from on-chain data? Strong demand is identified through several on-chain indicators, including: a) Net accumulation of BTC (new issuance vs. long-term inactive supply), b) Wallets that consistently accumulate without selling, and c) Declining balances of BTC held by Over-The-Counter (OTC) desks, indicating large purchases moving off-market. 3. What are OTC desks, and why is their BTC balance important for Bitcoin demand analysis? OTC (Over-The-Counter) desks facilitate large, private Bitcoin transactions, often for institutional investors or high-net-worth individuals. A sharp decline in BTC held by these desks suggests that large buyers are actively acquiring Bitcoin and moving it into long-term storage, indicating robust institutional Bitcoin demand . 4. Does strong Bitcoin demand guarantee price increases? While strong Bitcoin demand is a significant bullish indicator and often correlates with upward price pressure over the long term, it does not guarantee immediate price increases. Market prices are influenced by many factors, including macroeconomic conditions, regulatory news, and broader market sentiment. However, sustained demand provides a strong foundation for future growth. 5. How does investor conviction play a role in Bitcoin demand? Investor conviction refers to a strong belief in Bitcoin’s long-term value, leading investors to hold or accumulate assets even during periods of volatility. This conviction is crucial for sustained Bitcoin demand as it reduces selling pressure during dips and supports a healthier, more stable market over time. If you found this analysis insightful, consider sharing it with your network! Your support helps us continue to deliver in-depth crypto market insights. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption. This post Bitcoin Demand: Unwavering Strength Despite Market Turbulence first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Trump Media to Launch Utility Token and Explore Crypto ETFs After $20 Million Q2 Loss
body: Trump Media posts $20M Q2 loss despite rising sales and positive operating cash flow. Truth+ expands globally with new features, digital wallet, and AI-driven tools in beta. TMTG plans utility token and explores crypto ETFs to support fintech expansion. Trump Media & Technology Group (Nasdaq, NYSE Texas: DJT), the company behind Truth Social, reported a net loss of $20 million for the second quarter of 2025, according to its 10-Q filing. The figure is an increase from the $16.4 million loss reported during the same period last year. Following the earnings announcement on Monday, August 4, the company’s shares (DJT) dropped by 3.8% on Nasdaq. Despite the widening net loss, TMTG’s financials revealed some bright spots. The company recorded a 5.5% increase in net sales year-over-year, reaching $883,300 in Q2. While the operating loss stood at $43.5 million, this was offset by $16.8 million in interest income and $11.1 million from other investments. $Djt #Tmtg #TrumpMedia Q2 2025 earnings and opportunities: $Djt grew from $0.34 billion in financial assets to $3.1 billion in financial assets (an 800% increase) as $Djt sold $1.5 billion in stock at $25.72 to … The post Trump Media to Launch Utility Token and Explore Crypto ETFs After $20 Million Q2 Loss appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Market sees this altcoin delivering 30x before BTC’s next surge
body: A presale gem with a roadmap to triple-digit gains MUTM is currently priced at just $0.035 in Phase 6 of its presale. At this rate, a move to $1.05—its projected post-listing target based on platform growth forecasts, tokenomics, and Layer-2 deployment—would represent a 30x return. Unlike vague memecoins or tokens with no real use case, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is building the foundation for a decentralized lending ecosystem powered by P2P and P2C mechanics. And that’s exactly why attention is shifting from established coins to this rising DeFi star. More than 14,800 holders have already joined the project, and 7% of the allocated 170 million tokens in this round have been sold. The clock is ticking toward a 15% price increase in Phase 7, which will move the token to $0.040. But for those buying in now, the upside remains unmatched. At the time of writing, the listing price is already locked at $0.06, giving new buyers a guaranteed gain just by entering early. Long-term projections remain even more explosive. A wallet that entered Mutuum Finance (MUTM) in Phase 1 with just $3,000 rotated from Chainlink (LINK) is now sitting on roughly $10,500 worth of tokens. And based on post-launch projections toward $1, that’s a full 30x return within sight. For investors looking to outperform the broader market, this is not a development to overlook. Lending utility sets the foundation for DeFi expansion One of the biggest growth catalysts behind Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will be its two-pronged lending approach. On the P2C side, lenders will deposit blue-chip assets like Ethereum, BNB, MATIC, or stablecoins into liquidity pools and earn high-yield passive returns. For instance, a user depositing $8,000 in MATIC will be able to earn 9.5% APY—equivalent to $760 annually—just by contributing to the ecosystem. Borrowers, meanwhile, will tap into the same pool by putting up collateral. With a 65% loan-to-value ratio, that AVAX deposit will enable another user to borrow $5,200 in USDC, unlocking capital without selling long-term holdings. P2P lending will also be part of the Mutuum Finance (MUTM) blueprint, allowing users to directly negotiate loan terms on more volatile or meme crypto assets like DOGE, TRUMP, FLOKI, and BONK. This model will introduce flexibility and customization, attracting a broader range of DeFi users and enabling yield strategies beyond conventional platforms. But this is just the beginning. The development team has announced plans to integrate the platform on a Layer-2 network at launch. This will significantly reduce gas fees and improve transaction speed, critical for scaling user adoption. Combined with the upcoming decentralized stablecoin that will be minted and burned against loan creation, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is laying the groundwork for long-term demand and consistent utility. Community building To instill trust and enhance security, the project has partnered with CertiK for a comprehensive audit. The platform scored 95.00 in the Token Scan and achieved a Skynet rating of 78.00. Additionally, a $50,000 bug bounty campaign is underway, inviting ethical hackers to rigorously test the code for vulnerabilities. Alongside this, a $100,000 giveaway is being offered to early believers, with ten winners walking away with $10,000 in MUTM tokens each. With more than 12,000 followers on X (formerly Twitter) and rising, the community is expanding by the hour. But access to the $0.035 price level won’t last much longer. The current phase is nearing sellout, and once it closes, Phase 7 will push the token to $0.040. That’s a 15% bump—instantly increasing the entry price for anyone who hesitates. For those still on the sidelines, this is a rare moment in the DeFi cycle: a live presale with a locked-in listing price, audited smart contracts, active incentives, and a clear roadmap that supports long-term valuation. As other assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum move sideways, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is preparing to step into the spotlight. There’s still time to get in early, but not much. title: YGG Treasury Management: A Bold New Era for On-Chain Guilds
body: BitcoinWorld YGG Treasury Management: A Bold New Era for On-Chain Guilds The world of decentralized finance and blockchain gaming is constantly evolving, with innovation driving new approaches to digital asset management. One of the most significant shifts we are witnessing is in YGG treasury management , as pioneering entities move from simply holding assets to actively cultivating them for sustainable growth. Yield Guild Games (YGG), a leading decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) in the GameFi space, has just announced a groundbreaking initiative that sets a new standard for on-chain asset stewardship. This strategic move signals a profound commitment to long-term ecosystem health and value creation, moving beyond traditional passive treasury approaches. What is YGG Treasury Management’s Bold New Approach? Yield Guild Games has publicly stated its decision to allocate a substantial 50 million YGG tokens, valued at approximately $7.5 million, to a dedicated on-chain ecosystem pool. This pool will be overseen by a newly established proprietary guild, marking a pivotal transition. The core idea is to transform YGG’s treasury from a static vault into a dynamic, actively managed fund. This initiative is designed with several clear objectives: Generating Returns: By actively managing assets, the guild aims to deploy capital in strategies that yield positive returns, increasing the overall value of the treasury. Improving Sustainability: Active management can create new revenue streams, reducing reliance on token issuance and enhancing the long-term financial viability of the YGG ecosystem. Supporting Ecosystem Strategy: The managed assets can be strategically deployed to fund new GameFi projects, support community initiatives, and foster innovation within the YGG network, directly aligning with the guild’s mission. This move reflects a growing maturity in the DAO landscape, where organizations are recognizing the need for sophisticated financial strategies to ensure longevity and impact. It’s not just about accumulating assets; it’s about making those assets work for the community. Why is Active YGG Treasury Management Crucial Now? In the volatile and rapidly changing cryptocurrency market, passive asset holding can expose organizations to significant risks. The bear market of recent years highlighted the vulnerabilities of treasuries that simply held tokens without active strategies for growth or risk mitigation. YGG’s decision to pivot to active YGG treasury management is a proactive response to these market realities and a forward-looking strategy for resilience. Consider the contrast between passive and active treasury approaches: Aspect Passive Treasury Management Active YGG Treasury Management Primary Goal Asset preservation Growth, sustainability, ecosystem support Risk Exposure High exposure to market downturns Mitigated through diversification, active strategies Return Potential Limited to asset appreciation Potential for consistent yield generation Resource Utilization Assets sit idle Assets are put to work This strategic shift demonstrates a commitment to operational excellence and financial prudence, ensuring that YGG remains at the forefront of the GameFi sector, capable of adapting to market dynamics and seizing new opportunities. How Will the On-Chain Guild Operate for YGG Treasury Management? The newly formed proprietary guild will be at the heart of this active YGG treasury management . While specific operational details are likely to evolve, the fundamental principles will revolve around transparency, accountability, and strategic deployment. Being an “on-chain” guild implies that many of its operations, decisions, and transactions will be recorded and verifiable on the blockchain, fostering a high degree of trust and visibility for the YGG community. Key operational aspects may include: Investment Mandate: The guild will operate under a clear mandate outlining permissible investment strategies, risk parameters, and return objectives. This could include yield farming, liquidity provision, staking, or even strategic investments in emerging GameFi projects. Expertise and Governance: The guild members are expected to possess significant expertise in decentralized finance, GameFi economics, and market analysis. Decisions might be subject to multi-signature approvals or even broader DAO governance mechanisms, ensuring community oversight. Performance Tracking: Regular reports on the guild’s performance, asset allocation, and generated returns will be crucial for maintaining transparency and accountability to the YGG token holders. This data-driven approach allows for continuous optimization of strategies. The on-chain nature of this guild is particularly significant. It moves beyond traditional corporate structures, embedding financial operations within a transparent, decentralized framework. This innovation could inspire other DAOs to adopt similar models, pushing the boundaries of decentralized finance. What Are the Benefits of This Strategic YGG Treasury Management? The implications of YGG’s new treasury strategy extend far beyond simple financial returns. This move has the potential to create a ripple effect of benefits across the entire YGG ecosystem and potentially the broader GameFi industry. Enhanced Financial Resilience: By actively generating returns, YGG can build a more robust treasury, better equipped to weather market downturns and fund long-term initiatives without diluting its token supply through constant new emissions. This creates a more stable economic foundation. Increased Value for YGG Token Holders: A growing and sustainably managed treasury can directly contribute to the intrinsic value of the YGG token. While not a direct price driver, a healthy treasury signals strong fundamentals and long-term viability, which can positively influence investor confidence. Accelerated Ecosystem Growth: The ability to deploy capital strategically means YGG can more effectively support new game development, invest in crucial infrastructure, and expand its global reach. This fuels innovation and brings more value to players and developers within the ecosystem. Pioneering Decentralized Financial Models: YGG is setting a precedent for how DAOs can manage their assets in a sophisticated and decentralized manner. This could lead to the development of best practices and new financial primitives for the entire Web3 space, pushing the boundaries of what’s possible with on-chain governance and finance. Greater Autonomy and Self-Sufficiency: Reducing reliance on external funding rounds or constant token sales for operational expenses empowers YGG to become more self-sufficient. This autonomy allows for more agile decision-making and a stronger focus on community-driven initiatives. Are There Challenges to Active YGG Treasury Management? While the benefits are clear, active treasury management in a decentralized context is not without its challenges. YGG, like any pioneering organization, will need to navigate potential hurdles to ensure the success of this initiative. Market Volatility: Cryptocurrency markets are inherently volatile. Even with active management, significant market downturns can impact treasury value. The guild will need robust risk management strategies to mitigate these effects. Operational Complexity: Managing a multi-million dollar portfolio on-chain requires sophisticated tools, expert personnel, and continuous monitoring. The operational overhead can be substantial. Governance and Accountability: While transparency is built-in, ensuring effective governance and holding the proprietary guild accountable for its performance will be an ongoing task. Striking the right balance between autonomy for the guild and oversight from the broader DAO is crucial. Security Risks: On-chain operations always carry smart contract risks, potential for exploits, or other security vulnerabilities. Robust auditing and security measures will be paramount. Talent Acquisition: Finding and retaining top talent with expertise in both DeFi and GameFi, who are also aligned with decentralized principles, can be challenging. Addressing these challenges proactively through robust governance frameworks, continuous security audits, and a commitment to transparency will be key to the long-term success of this innovative YGG treasury management approach. What Does This Mean for the Future of GameFi and YGG? YGG’s move into active treasury management is more than just an internal financial decision; it’s a statement about the future direction of GameFi and decentralized organizations. It signals a shift towards greater financial sophistication and sustainability within the Web3 gaming ecosystem. For YGG itself, this strategy aims to solidify its position as a leader in the GameFi space, enabling it to better support its network of subDAOs, scholarship programs, and game partnerships. A stronger treasury means more resources to invest in the play-to-earn economy, benefiting players, developers, and the broader community. More broadly, this could set a new precedent for other DAOs. As the Web3 space matures, the ability to manage assets effectively will become a defining characteristic of successful decentralized organizations. YGG is demonstrating a viable path forward, showcasing how DAOs can evolve beyond simple token distribution to become financially resilient and strategically astute entities. The integration of financial expertise with community governance, all operating on-chain, represents a powerful model for the future of decentralized autonomous organizations. It underscores the potential for Web3 to build not just new applications, but entirely new forms of economic and organizational structures. In conclusion, Yield Guild Games’ launch of a $7.5 million on-chain guild for active treasury management is a monumental step. It reflects a mature understanding of decentralized finance, a proactive approach to market challenges, and a deep commitment to the long-term sustainability and growth of its ecosystem. This bold initiative is poised to generate returns, enhance financial resilience, and further solidify YGG’s pioneering role in the GameFi industry, setting a new benchmark for sophisticated DAO operations. The future of decentralized asset management is here, and YGG is leading the charge. YGG Treasury Management: A Bold New Era for On-Chain Guilds Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the primary goal of YGG’s new on-chain guild? A1: The primary goal is to shift from passive treasury holding to active YGG treasury management , aiming to generate returns, improve sustainability, and strategically support YGG’s long-term ecosystem development. Q2: How much capital has YGG allocated to this new initiative? A2: YGG has allocated 50 million YGG tokens, valued at approximately $7.5 million, to the new on-chain ecosystem pool managed by the proprietary guild. Q3: What does “on-chain guild” mean in this context? A3: An “on-chain guild” signifies that the operations, decisions, and transactions related to treasury management will be recorded and verifiable on the blockchain, ensuring transparency and accountability. Q4: What are some potential benefits of active YGG treasury management? A4: Benefits include enhanced financial resilience, increased potential value for YGG token holders, accelerated ecosystem growth, pioneering new decentralized financial models, and greater organizational autonomy. Q5: What are the main challenges YGG might face with this new approach? A5: Challenges include navigating cryptocurrency market volatility, managing operational complexity, ensuring effective governance and accountability, mitigating security risks, and attracting top talent. Q6: How does this initiative impact the broader GameFi industry? A6: This initiative sets a new precedent for how decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) can manage their assets, promoting financial sophistication and sustainability within the GameFi and broader Web3 ecosystem. title: Binance makes Bitcoin options writing available to all users
body: Cryptocurrency exchange Binance has opened Bitcoin ( BTC ) options writing access to all users, responding to increased retail demand for strategic trading tools, according to information communicated to Finbold on August 4. The expansion allows users to express market views, manage risk, earn premiums, and enhance yield through options writing strategies beyond traditional long or short positions. Bitcoin options trading volume has grown significantly, reaching $138.76 billion in June 2025 from $4.11 billion in 2020, a 3200% growth in five years. The increased access enables a broader user base to deploy sophisticated trading strategies using options alongside futures contracts for hedging and profit opportunities. “Users around the world utilize Binance’s derivatives products for liquidity and hedging at highly-competitive prices and our Bitcoin options products will meet the growing retail demand for more and better trading tools,” said Jeff Li, VP of Product at Binance. “As with traditional markets, accelerating crypto adoption will increase demand for more sophisticated liquidity tools and we are committed to building a fuller suite of derivative products to support our users.” Trading fees promotion and enhanced program To celebrate the launch, all users receive a 20% discount on Taker and Maker trading fees for newly listed Options contracts, including ETH , BNB , and SOL contracts. Binance has also improved its Options Enhanced Program for high-volume and institutional traders, offering better maker/taker fees, lower qualification thresholds, and longer grace periods for onboarding. Binance implements risk management controls requiring option writers to post margin as collateral for their obligations. Users must complete a mandatory suitability assessment to access Binance Options products. The BTC Options use USDT as both collateral and settlement asset, with a contract unit of 1 and strike intervals ranging from ±0.05 to ±0.95 delta. The platform offers daily, weekly, monthly, and quarterly expiration options, all expiring at 08:00 UTC on their respective dates. Transaction fees are set at 0.03% with exercise fees at 0.015%. Binance plans to extend options writing access to additional tokens like ETH for all users in the future. Featured image via Shutterstock. The post Binance makes Bitcoin options writing available to all users appeared first on Finbold .

title: Analysts say MUTM could rally 1600% as ETH nears $3,800
body: Low market cap, high momentum—why analysts are eyeing MUTM Ethereum’s rally is far from surprising; its Layer-1 dominance and integration into ETFs have long made it a favorite among institutions. However, the upside is becoming increasingly limited in percentage terms. This is precisely where Mutuum Finance (MUTM) shines. With a presale price of just $0.035 in Phase 6 and a capped total supply of 4 billion tokens, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) remains heavily undervalued by market standards. Over $13.7 million has been raised so far, with 7% of Phase 6’s 170 million tokens already sold, and over 14,700 holders are onboard—indicators of growing demand even before launch. An early investor who swapped $5,000 worth of BTC in Phase 1 has already seen over 3.5x in unrealized gains. At listing, the price is expected to reach $0.06, but mid-term forecasts are pushing it as high as $0.56, which would translate to over 16x returns from entry. The next presale price bump to $0.040 will mark a 15% jump, reinforcing the urgency among investors to enter before Phase 7 triggers. What sets Mutuum Finance (MUTM) apart isn’t just presale hype—it’s the project’s clear vision to redefine decentralized lending through smart contract-based automation, scalable infrastructure, and real token utility. The upcoming beta launch, scheduled alongside the listing, will introduce users to the platform’s advanced lending models on a Layer-2 network, ensuring minimal gas fees and ultra-fast transaction speeds. This is expected to attract both DeFi enthusiasts and newcomers alike, increasing adoption and, with it, demand for MUTM tokens. Further elevating Mutuum Finance (MUTM)’s profile is the likely listing on top-tier exchanges such as Binance, KuCoin, and Kraken. These platforms not only provide deep liquidity but also act as trust amplifiers. Once Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is exposed to millions of retail traders via these exchanges, price discovery will naturally tilt upward as users interact with its core features firsthand. Real-world utility: the key to sustained demand Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Finance’s protocol will be centered on two lending models: Peer-to-Contract (P2C) and Peer-to-Peer (P2P). In the P2C model, lenders will earn attractive yields by depositing assets into smart contract pools, while borrowers will access overcollateralized loans. For instance, depositing $10,000 worth of SOL with an 80% loan-to-value (LTV) will unlock an annual return of around 6.5% APY, meaning $650 passive income per year. Simultaneously, a borrower will be able to take out $8,000 in DAI, maintaining exposure to their underlying SOL. The P2P model, on the other hand, will offer personalized term negotiation and will be ideal for users seeking higher yields through higher risk exposure. Both models will be designed to operate seamlessly with Mutuum Finance (MUTM)’s upcoming native stablecoin, which will be minted and burned based on real borrowing activity, ensuring tight control over supply and enhanced collateral backing. To strengthen investor trust, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Finance has partnered with CertiK, a leading blockchain security firm. The project’s Token Scan Score stands at 95, while Skynet’s monitoring score is 78—both above-industry standards. Moreover, a $50,000 bug bounty program is currently live, incentivizing white-hat developers to audit and secure the platform. $100K giveaway Adding to its promotional drive, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has also launched a $100,000 giveaway campaign . Ten lucky participants will receive $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens each, a move that not only drives viral interest but also encourages community growth across social channels. The protocol already boasts over 12,000 Twitter followers, and that number is expected to climb steeply as the listing date approaches. With strong fundamentals, real-world DeFi utility, upcoming beta functionality, and major exchange exposure on the horizon, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is shaping up to be more than just another token launch. As Ethereum inches toward $3,800 with limited upside, investors are turning their sights toward where real exponential growth lies—and that path seems to lead directly through MUTM. The clock is ticking—Phase 7 will raise the presale price to $0.040, and buyers waiting on the sidelines may find themselves priced out of one of 2025’s most anticipated listings. title: 113,575 Americans at Risk of Fraud After Hackers Hit Healthcare Firm, Potentially Exposing Names, Social Security Numbers, Financial Account Numbers and More
body: Tens of thousands of Americans are staring at the possibility of fraud after thieves stole their information from a healthcare firm. In a notice to the Office of the Maine Attorney General, the Arkansas-based Highlands Oncology Group says 113,575 Americans are impacted by a massive cybersecurity incident. In a data incident notice posted on its website, Highlands says that an unauthorized entity gained access to its systems and stole files that may include patients’ names, dates of birth, Social Security numbers, driver’s license/state identification numbers, passport numbers, credit/debit card numbers, financial account numbers, medical treatment records, medical record numbers, patient account numbers, and/or health insurance policy records. “Highlands Oncology Group PA recently discovered a data incident that may have involved the personal information for certain individuals. On June 2, 2025, Highlands discovered it was the victim of a cyber-attack, and certain Highlands files and systems were inaccessible… The forensic investigation determined that an unauthorized third party accessed Highlands’ computer network at times between January 21, 2025, and June 2, 2025, and encrypted some of its files. The investigation also determined that the third party may have accessed and acquired certain files from Highlands’ systems during this period.” Highlands offers a full spectrum of cancer care services, including chemotherapy, radiation oncology, surgical oncology, as well as supportive services like rehabilitation, massage, lymphedema therapy, genetic counseling and pharmacy. The firm says it has sent letters of notification to affected individuals, while offering complimentary identity theft protection services for those whose Social Security numbers, driver’s license or state ID numbers were involved in the incident. Highlands is encouraging patients to stay vigilant by reviewing their account statements and reporting any suspicious activity that could suggest fraud or identity theft. title: Ethereum Whale Unveils Strategic Accumulation After Year of Selling
body: BitcoinWorld Ethereum Whale Unveils Strategic Accumulation After Year of Selling In the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies, the movements of large holders, often dubbed ‘whales,’ can send ripples across the market. Recently, the crypto community has been abuzz with news concerning a particular Ethereum whale , an early participant in Ethereum’s Initial Coin Offering (ICO). This address, known for consistently selling ETH over the past year, has made a remarkable pivot, resuming significant accumulation. This shift by a prominent Ethereum whale signals a potential change in market sentiment and warrants a closer look. The Ethereum Whale’s Surprising Shift: What Happened? For over a year, this specific Ethereum whale address, which acquired ETH at the incredibly low price of $0.31 during the ICO, had been a net seller. Their actions often correlated with market downturns or periods of uncertainty. However, recent on-chain analysis, notably by @ai_9684xtpa on X, reveals a significant reversal in this pattern. Over the past three weeks, this address has aggressively accumulated 13,600 ETH, valued at approximately $47 million at current prices. The most recent withdrawal occurred just moments before the analyst’s report, highlighting the immediacy of this change. To put this into perspective, the last major accumulation phase by this Ethereum whale was two years ago, involving a deposit of 6,000 ETH to the OKX Exchange. This prior move was considerably smaller than the current withdrawals, underscoring the magnitude of the present accumulation. The wallet now boasts a holding of 59,718 ETH, worth around $210 million. This drastic shift from selling to buying suggests a renewed conviction in Ethereum’s future trajectory. Action Type Timeframe ETH Volume Approx. USD Value (Current) Previous Trend Past Year Net Selling Varies Current Accumulation Last 3 Weeks 13,600 ETH $47 Million Previous Major Accumulation 2 Years Ago 6,000 ETH Significantly Less Why is This Ethereum Whale Accumulating Now? The motivations behind such a significant shift are often multifaceted, but one prominent theory points to the classic market psychology of ‘Fear Of Missing Out’ (FOMO). After a period of price consolidation or even decline, a major holder might perceive that the market is on the cusp of a significant upward move. For an Ethereum whale who has seen multiple market cycles, recognizing potential inflection points is crucial. Several factors could contribute to this renewed confidence: Anticipation of Spot ETH ETFs: While not yet approved in all jurisdictions, the potential for spot Ethereum Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) could open the floodgates for institutional capital, significantly boosting demand for ETH. Ethereum’s Ecosystem Growth: The continuous development of Ethereum’s Layer 2 solutions, DeFi protocols, and NFT ecosystem strengthens its long-term utility and value proposition. Macroeconomic Factors: A shift in global economic conditions, such as potential interest rate cuts or increased liquidity, could favor risk assets like cryptocurrencies. Technical Analysis Indicators: The whale might be reacting to specific technical chart patterns or on-chain metrics that suggest an imminent price rally. This Ethereum whale , having bought ETH at a negligible price, possesses an extremely low cost basis, giving them immense flexibility. Their decision to accumulate now, rather than continuing to take profits, suggests a strong belief that Ethereum’s price has substantial room for growth from its current levels. What Does This Ethereum Whale’s Move Mean for the Market? The actions of a large Ethereum whale , particularly one with such a historical connection to the asset, can have several implications for the broader market: 1. A Potential Bullish Signal When a large, sophisticated investor with deep knowledge and early access to an asset begins to accumulate, it is often interpreted as a bullish signal. It suggests that those with significant capital and insights are positioning themselves for an upward trend. This can instill confidence in smaller investors and potentially encourage broader market participation. 2. Impact on Supply Dynamics Accumulation by whales often involves withdrawing ETH from exchanges to private wallets. This reduces the readily available supply of ETH on exchanges, which, if demand remains constant or increases, can exert upward pressure on prices. The more ETH held off-exchange, the tighter the circulating supply becomes. 3. Shifting Market Sentiment News of a major Ethereum whale accumulating can significantly influence market sentiment. It can turn a neutral or bearish outlook into a more optimistic one, as participants perceive that smart money is re-entering the market. This psychological effect can lead to increased buying pressure from other market participants, creating a positive feedback loop. 4. Validation of Ethereum’s Long-Term Value An ICO participant accumulating after a year of selling reinforces the long-term viability and potential of Ethereum. It suggests that even after years of market volatility, significant players still see fundamental value and growth potential in the network and its native asset. Actionable Insights from Ethereum Whale Behavior While tracking Ethereum whale movements provides valuable insights, it’s important for individual investors to approach this information with a balanced perspective. Here are some actionable insights: Observe, Don’t Blindly Follow: Whale movements are one data point among many. They can indicate market trends or shifts in sentiment, but they should not be the sole basis for investment decisions. Understand On-Chain Analytics: Tools that track whale movements are part of a larger field of on-chain analytics. Learning how to interpret these data points can provide a deeper understanding of market flows and participant behavior. Focus on Fundamentals: Ultimately, an asset’s long-term value is driven by its utility, adoption, and development. While whale movements can signal short-to-medium term sentiment, a strong fundamental understanding of Ethereum’s technology and ecosystem remains paramount. Manage Risk: Even large investors can be wrong, and markets are inherently unpredictable. Always practice sound risk management, including diversification and investing only what you can afford to lose. The recent shift by this significant Ethereum whale serves as a compelling reminder of the dynamic nature of cryptocurrency markets. Their move from a year of selling to aggressive accumulation is a notable event, potentially signaling renewed confidence and a shifting tide for Ethereum. Whether driven by impending regulatory changes, ecosystem growth, or a simple belief in future price appreciation, this whale’s actions are certainly a point of interest for anyone tracking the crypto landscape. This development underscores the importance of staying informed about on-chain data and understanding how the actions of major players can reflect broader market sentiment. As Ethereum continues its evolution, the vigilance of its largest holders will remain a fascinating aspect of its journey. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is an Ethereum whale? An Ethereum whale is an individual or entity that holds a very large amount of Ethereum (ETH). Their transactions, especially large ones, can significantly influence market dynamics due to the sheer volume of their holdings. Q2: Why are Ethereum whale movements important? Whale movements are important because they can indicate shifts in market sentiment, potential future price trends, and the conviction of large, often sophisticated, investors. Their buying or selling can impact liquidity and supply on exchanges. Q3: What is on-chain analysis? On-chain analysis involves examining data directly from a blockchain, such as transaction volumes, wallet balances, exchange inflows/outflows, and mining activity. This data provides transparency into market participant behavior, including that of large holders like an Ethereum whale . Q4: Does an Ethereum whale’s accumulation guarantee price increases? No, while an Ethereum whale’s accumulation is often seen as a bullish signal, it does not guarantee future price increases. Markets are influenced by numerous factors, and whale movements are just one piece of the puzzle. It’s crucial to conduct your own research and consider multiple indicators. Q5: How can I track Ethereum whale activity? Several on-chain analytics platforms and crypto news outlets provide data and analysis on whale movements. These platforms aggregate publicly available blockchain data to highlight significant transactions and wallet changes. If you found this article insightful, consider sharing it with your network on social media to help others understand the fascinating dynamics of the crypto market and the influential role of an Ethereum whale . To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price market. This post Ethereum Whale Unveils Strategic Accumulation After Year of Selling first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Credit Agricole's Asset Servicing Unit Backs Tokenized SME Exchange in Europe
body: CACEIS, the asset servicing arm of Credit Agricole, has acquired a minority stake in French fintech Kriptown to support the launch of Lise, a blockchain-based exchange aimed at SMEs and mid-cap companies. Lise, short for Lightning Stock Exchange, is set to be Europe’s first tokenized exchange focused on streamlining equity financing and public listings for smaller firms, CACEIS said in a press release on Monday. Lise is currently awaiting regulatory approval as a DLT Trading and Settlement System (DLT TSS) under the European pilot regime. If approved, it would allow companies to issue, trade, and settle financial instruments directly on a distributed ledger, cutting down the time and costs associated with traditional IPO processes. Lise would allow investors to trade shares on a secondary market that operates around the clock, without the bottlenecks of standard clearing houses, or lengthy coordination of multiple intermediaries. The move aligns with CACEIS’s broader push into digital assets, which saw it receive MiCA approval earlier this year. Founded in 2018, Kriptown develops infrastructure for tokenizing financial instruments, integrating both market and post-trade operations. Lise’s first IPO is planned for 2025, contingent on receiving the necessary approvals.

title: Ripple CTO Once Said $1,000,000 Per XRP Is More Practical Than $1. Here’s why
body: A resurfaced comment from Ripple’s Chief Technology Officer, David Schwartz, has drawn renewed attention following a tweet from crypto investor XRP Governor. The tweet references Schwartz’s Quora response from several years ago, in which he argues that a high market price for XRP is beneficial for its use in large-scale payments, rather than a hindrance to adoption. XRP Governor highlighted the implications of Schwartz’s perspective with the assertion: “Ripple CTO David Schwartz says $1,000,000 per $XRP is more practical than $1. This isn’t fantasy — it’s coming from the architect of the XRP Ledger.” This claim is rooted in Schwartz’s original remarks addressing concerns that a finite and potentially high-priced XRP could obstruct mainstream adoption by banks . The concern, posed by a Quora user, suggested that if XRP cannot be mined and must be purchased, financial institutions might prefer the asset to remain low-priced to avoid increased costs. Schwartz rejected that view by explaining the underlying economic mechanics of high-value digital assets and their correlation with liquidity. BREAKING: Ripple CTO David Schwartz says $1,000,000 per $XRP is more practical than $1. This isn’t fantasy — it’s coming from the architect of the XRP Ledger. KNOW WHAT YOU HODL. pic.twitter.com/bHDGsfzCJr — XRP Governor (@xrpgovernor) August 2, 2025 David Schwartz’s Response on Asset Pricing and Liquidity Schwartz’s argument centers on the relationship between asset pricing, liquidity, and transaction efficiency. He stated clearly that to make a $1 million payment, one would always need $1 million worth of XRP , regardless of the unit price of the asset. According to Schwartz, the concern about high prices deterring adoption overlooks a critical dynamic: higher prices generally imply greater market liquidity, which makes it easier and cheaper to execute large payments without disrupting the market. To illustrate his point, Schwartz used the historical example of Bitcoin. He described a scenario in which a person attempted to use Bitcoin priced at $100 to buy a $1 million property. Such a purchase would have required buying a massive amount of Bitcoin, significantly moving the market upward during the purchase, and then driving the price downward again when the recipient attempted to convert it. Schwartz noted that this volatility and slippage would have rendered such a transaction impractical. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 He contrasted this with the state of Bitcoin when it surpassed $10,000. At this higher valuation, one could acquire $1 million worth of Bitcoin using a far smaller portion of the total circulating supply, reducing the impact on market price and ensuring a smoother transaction. Schwartz concluded that this same principle applies to XRP. He wrote that “a higher priced asset is a better vehicle for payments, at least if you’re targeting high value payments.” XRP Governor Emphasizes the Practicality of High XRP Valuation XRP Governor’s tweet emphasized that these views were not speculative comments from an outsider but came directly from the CTO of Ripple and one of the original architects of the XRP Ledger. By highlighting the quote about $1 million per XRP being more practical than $1, XRP Governor framed Schwartz’s past remarks as validation for the long-term potential of XRP to reach high valuations, provided it becomes an asset used globally for large-scale cross-border payments. The tweet also included the statement “KNOW WHAT YOU HODL,” reinforcing a narrative that long-term XRP holders should consider Schwartz’s liquidity argument as part of their rationale for holding the asset. The suggestion is that mainstream utility of XRP at a high unit price is not incompatible with adoption, but rather may be an enabler of it. title: Binance Opens 'Bitcoin Options Writing' to All Users
body: Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange, announced on Monday that it is opening access to bitcoin (BTC) "options writing" for all users. The move is a direct response to a significant increase in retail demand for more strategic and sophisticated trading tools. Options are derivative contracts that allow the purchaser the right to buy or sell the underlying asset at a pre-determined price on or before a specific date. A call option gives the right to buy and represents a bullish bet on the market while a put option offers downside protection. Writing options refers to selling call or put, which is akin to offering insurance against bullish or bearish price moves in the underlying asset. The writer (seller) is compensated for the same in the form of an upfront premium. Sophisticated crypto holders are known to write options to earn extra yield on top of the spot market holdings. “Accelerating crypto adoption will increase demand for more sophisticated liquidity tools and we are committed to building a fuller suite of derivative products to support our users.” Jeff Li, VP of product at Binance, commented on the development. Binance said it will maintain robust risk management controls, requiring options writers to pass a mandatory suitability assessment and post margin to collateralize their obligations. The announcement comes as the broader BTC options market has seen explosive growth, with total trading volume soaring over 3200% from $4.11 billion in 2020 to $138.76 billion in June 2025, Binance's press release shared with CoinDesk said. By enabling a broader user base to write options, Binance aims to empower traders to express market views, manage risk, earn upfront premiums, and implement strategies that go beyond simple directional bets. To celebrate the launch, Binance is offering a 20% discount on Taker and Maker fees for all newly listed options contracts, including those for ether (ETH), BNB (BNB), and Solana (SOL). The exchange is also improving its Options Enhanced Program for high-volume and institutional traders, offering lower qualification thresholds and more attractive fee structures. title: Coinbase Slides Nearly 20% in Worst Weekly Performance Since September 2024
body: Shares in Nasdaq-listed cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase (COIN) tanked 19.6% to $314.69 last week, registering its worst performance since September 2024, according to data source TradingView. On Thursday, COIN published its second-quarter earnings report, revealing a net operating earnings per share of 12 cents, with an 88.8% year-over-year decrease in the bottom line. The $1.5 billion in revenue fell short of FactSet's $1.59 billion estimate, while the EBIDTA declined to $512 million as transaction revenue slipped 39% from the previous quarter. The price sell-off is consistent with the late June analysis by crypto research firm 10x , which stated that the second-quarter price rally appeared overstretched relative to fundamentals. The firm recommended shorting COIN while buying BTC. Early last month, investment firm H.C. Wainwright sharply downgraded Coinbase to Sell from Buy, saying that the second quarter rally outpaced fundamentals. COIN put options in demand The sell-off has traders chasing downside protection in COIN. As of Friday, the one-year put-call skew, which measures the implied volatility (demand) differential between put and call options, rose to 2.6%, the highest since April 21, according to data source Market Chameleon . In other words, put options, offering insurance against price losses in the underlying asset, traded at a 2.6 volatility premium to call options or bullish bets.
